OPERATION.COMMENT: load project directory automatically if Visum Instance is opened via double click

EXECUTESCRIPTPARA.INTERNALSCRIPTCODE:
folder_path = Visum.GetPath(2).rsplit('\\', 2)[0] # path to opened Visum file (filenamepath), cut level to main folder level Visum.SetAllPaths(folder_path) # set all project directory paths to main to main folder level
folder_path_uni = Visum.GetPath(2).rsplit('\\', 2)[0]
''' specify project directory type, set path to sub folder '''
Visum.SetPath(15, "\\".join([folder_path, 'Attributes'])) Visum.SetPath(21, "\\".join([folder_path, 'Filter'])) Visum.SetPath(8, "\\".join([folder_path, 'Graphicparameter'])) Visum.SetPath(69, "\\".join([folder_path, 'Matrix'])) Visum.SetPath(1, "\\".join([folder_path, 'Net'])) Visum.SetPath(2, "\\".join([folder_path, 'Version']))
''' specify project directory type, set path to sub uni folder '''
Visum.SetPath(37, folder_path_uni) # scripts Visum.SetPath(12, folder_path_uni) # procedure settings file

OPERATION.COMMENT: set UDA is_Terminal if it's not set yet
set UDA is_Transfer if it's not set yet
set defined dwell time if it's not set yet
create folder for files for lintim instance

EXECUTESCRIPTPARA.INTERNALSCRIPTCODE:
import os
sep_directory = "\\"
folder_path =Visum.GetPath(2).rsplit(sep_directory, 2)[0] # path to opened Visum file (filenamepath), cut level to main folder level
name_instance = Visum.Net.AttValue("instance_name") name_scenario = Visum.Net.AttValue("scenario_name")
folder_interface = sep_directory.join([folder_path, "_Interface"]) folder_visum2lintim = sep_directory.join([folder_interface, "Visum2Lintim", name_scenario + "_" + name_instance]) folder_lintim2visum = sep_directory.join([folder_interface, "Lintim2Visum"])
# create folder # os.makedirs(folder_att, exist_ok=True) os.makedirs(folder_visum2lintim, exist_ok=True) os.makedirs(folder_lintim2visum, exist_ok=True)

import os
VehUnitList = Visum.Lists.CreateVehUnitList # create VehUnitList, # VehUnitList.Show() VehUnitList.AddColumn("TSysSet") VehUnitList.AddColumn("TotalCap") VehUnitList.AddColumn("CostRateHourService") VehUnitList.AddColumn("CostRateHourEmpty") VehUnitList.AddColumn("CostRateKmService") VehUnitList.AddColumn("CostRateKmEmpty") VehUnitList.AddColumn("CostRateVehUnit")
sep_directory = "\\"
folder_path = Visum.GetPath(1).rsplit(sep_directory,2)[0]
name_instance = Visum.Net.AttValue("instance_name") name_scenario = Visum.Net.AttValue("scenario_name")
folder_interface = sep_directory.join([folder_path, "_Interface"]) folder_visum2lintim = sep_directory.join([folder_interface, "Visum2Lintim"]) folder_att = sep_directory.join([folder_visum2lintim, name_scenario + "_" + name_instance])
file = sep_directory.join([folder_att, "veh_units.att"]) # file and directory
VehUnitList.SaveToAttributeFile(FileName=file , Separator=59) # 59 = semicolon

OPERATION.COMMENT: save .net: Node (No, Coord), StopPoint (No, NodeNo, DEFDWELLTIME;IS_TERMINAL;IS_TRANSFER), Links (FROMNODENO, LENGTH, NO, TONODENO, TSYSSET, T_PUTSYS(B))

EXECUTESCRIPTPARA.INTERNALSCRIPTCODE:
sep_directory = "\\"
folder_path = Visum.UserPreferences.DocumentName.rsplit(sep_directory, 2)[0] # path to opened Visum file (filenamepath), cut level to main folder level filepath_net = Visum.GetPath(1)
name_instance = Visum.Net.AttValue("instance_name") name_scenario = Visum.Net.AttValue("scenario_name")
folder_interface = sep_directory.join([folder_path, "_Interface"]) folder_visum2lintim = sep_directory.join([folder_interface, "Visum2Lintim"]) folder_net = sep_directory.join([folder_visum2lintim, name_scenario + "_" + name_instance])
output= sep_directory.join([folder_net,"config.net"]) # file and directory layout = filepath_net +"layout_config.net" # layout-file
Visum.SaveNet(NetFile=output, LayoutFile=layout)

sep_directory = "\\"
Path_mtx = Visum.GetPath(69) # 69 = Matrix
folder_path = Visum.GetPath(15).rsplit(sep_directory, 2)[0]
name_instance = Visum.Net.AttValue("instance_name") name_scenario = Visum.Net.AttValue("scenario_name")
folder_interface = sep_directory.join([folder_path, "_Interface"]) folder_visum2lintim = sep_directory.join([folder_interface, "Visum2Lintim"]) folder_att = sep_directory.join([folder_visum2lintim, name_scenario + "_" + name_instance])
output= sep_directory.join([folder_att,"od.att"]) # file and directory
with open(Path_mtx + "od.mtx", "r") as f: content = f.readlines()
idx_start = content.index("$O;D3\n") + 8 idx_end = content.index("$NAMES\n")
del content[idx_end-1:] del content[0:idx_start]
header = "$ODPAIR:FROMZONENO;TOZONENO;DEMAND\n" with open(output, "w") as f: f.write(header) for row in content: row = ";".join(row.split()) f.write(row + "\n")

OPERATION.COMMENT: Calculate walk time for LinTim (Zones to Zones and Zones to Stops)
save fixed lines and delete them here afterwards

EXECUTESCRIPTPARA.INTERNALSCRIPTCODE:
filepath_net = Visum.GetPath(1) file_tmp = filepath_net + "Fixed_Lines_tmp.net"
Visum.SaveNet(NetFile=file_tmp, LayoutFile="layout_Export_Lines.net")
Visum.Net.Lines.RemoveAll()

Visum.Net.Zones.ConvertInto(TargetNetObjName="MAINZONE", targetCategory=0, SourceForKeyAttID="NO", DoNothingInCaseOfConflict=True, AllocateObjectsWithinPolygon=0, OnlyActive=False) # convert zones to mainzones

# get all active Nodes AllActiveNodes = Visum.Net.Nodes.GetAllActive for node in AllActiveNodes: Visum.Net.AddZone(no=node.AttValue("NO"), XCoord=node.AttValue("XCoord"), YCoord=node.AttValue("YCoord"))

OPERATION.COMMENT: Filter added zones for connectors creation
Filter only links, where walking is allowed
Write Walk Times based on JRT-Matrix

EXECUTESCRIPTPARA.INTERNALSCRIPTCODE:
sep_directory = "\\"
folder_path = Visum.GetPath(2).rsplit(sep_directory, 2)[0]
name_instance = Visum.Net.AttValue("instance_name") name_scenario = Visum.Net.AttValue("scenario_name")
folder_interface = sep_directory.join([folder_path, "_Interface"]) folder_visum2lintim = sep_directory.join([folder_interface, "Visum2Lintim"])
folder_att = sep_directory.join([folder_visum2lintim, name_scenario + "_" + name_instance])
my_od_list = Visum.Lists.CreateODPairList my_od_list.Show() my_od_list.SetObjects(True) my_od_list.AddColumn(Attribut='FromZoneNo') my_od_list.AddColumn(Attribut='ToZoneNo') my_od_list.AddColumn(Attribut='MatValue(267 JRT)') my_od_list = my_od_list.SaveToAttributeFile(FileName=sep_directory.join([folder_att,"walk_times.att"]), Separator=59) # Visum function to convert the visum object list to an array

sep_directory = "\\"
folder_path = Visum.GetPath(2).rsplit(sep_directory, 2)[0]
name_instance = Visum.Net.AttValue("instance_name") name_scenario = Visum.Net.AttValue("scenario_name")
folder_interface = sep_directory.join([folder_path, "_Interface"]) folder_visum2lintim = sep_directory.join([folder_interface, "Visum2Lintim"])
folder_att = sep_directory.join([folder_visum2lintim, name_scenario + "_" + name_instance]) file_name = sep_directory.join([folder_att,"walk_times.att"])
text_to_search = 'MATVALUE(267 JRT)' replacement_text = 'WALKTIME_MINUTES'
#read input file file = open(file_name, "rt") data = file.read() data = data.replace(text_to_search, replacement_text) file.close() #open the input file in write mode file = open(file_name, "wt") file.write(data) file.close()

OPERATION.COMMENT: add fixed lines again and delete tmp_fixed_lines

EXECUTESCRIPTPARA.INTERNALSCRIPTCODE:
filepath_net = Visum.GetPath(1) file_tmp = filepath_net + "Fixed_Lines_tmp.net"
# create NetRouteSearchTSys-Object and choose route search options NetReadRouteSearchTSysController = Visum.CreateNetReadRouteSearchTSys() NetReadRouteSearchTSysController.SetAttValue("HOWTOHANDLEINCOMPLETEROUTE", "SEARCHSHORTESTPATH") NetReadRouteSearchTSysController.SetAttValue("SHORTESTPATHCRITERION", 2) NetReadRouteSearchTSysController.SetAttValue("INCLUDEBLOCKEDLINKS", False) NetReadRouteSearchTSysController.SetAttValue("INCLUDEBLOCKEDTURNS", False) NetReadRouteSearchTSysController.SetAttValue("MAXDEVIATIONFACTOR", 20) NetReadRouteSearchTSysController.SetAttValue("WHATTODOIFSTOPPOINTNOTFOUND", 1) NetReadRouteSearchTSysController.SetAttValue("LINKTYPEFORINSERTEDLINKSREPLACINGMISSINGSHORTESTPATHS", 98)
# create NetRouteSearch-Object and assign NetRouteSearchTSys-objects NetReadRouteSearchController = Visum.CreateNetReadRouteSearch() NetReadRouteSearchController.SetForAllTSys(NetReadRouteSearchTSysController)
# create AddNetRead-Object and specify desired conflict avoiding method AddNetReadController = Visum.CreateAddNetReadController AddNetReadController.SetWhatToDo("Network", 5)
Visum.IO.LoadNet(NetFile=file_tmp, ReadAdditive=True, routeSearch=NetReadRouteSearchController, AddNetRead=AddNetReadController)
os.remove(file_tmp)
